markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resist Ruin](/Feats.aspx?ID=5758) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=751" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against void energy. You gain resistance 5 to void, and once per day, you can cast [_false vitality_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1523) as a 5th-rank divine innate spell.
name: Resist Ruin
